name: Star Battle (Prototype)
description:
Outer Space

Fly through space in your ship, and take out the obstacles in your way. 

This is a basic prototype to show how the combat will work in a future project.

Controls
  • WASD/Arrow Keys - Move your ship
  • Space/Left Ctrl/Z - Shoot
  • Left Shift/X/C - Change Weapon
  • Esc - Pause
